Name: Template
comments: Priority isn't as important, it simply helps to support the Dictionary functions of the ExtensionLoader and so extensions that need more focus get to run the soonest.
comment: This is essential for the extension to be added to the function

SetUp.comment: The StartInFile property details the char index where the StartUpFunction starts.
SetUp.comment1: The EndInFile property details the char index where the StartUpFunction ends.

comment1: Update cannot have parameters, if it does then the Extension will not be run.

Update.comment: The StartInFile property details the char index where the UpdateFunction starts.
Update.comment1: The EndInFile property details the char index where the StartUpFunction ends.

comments2: The parameters for this function will be supplemented at runtime

TimedUpdate.comment: The StartInFile property details the char index where the TimedUpdateFunction starts.
TimedUpdate.comment1: The EndInFile property details the char index where the TimedUpdateFunction ends.

Closing.comment: The StartInFile property details the char index where the ClosingFunction starts.
Closing.comment1: The EndInFile property details the char index where the TimedUpdate ends.
